mapper.select: select CITY as mostCommonTripDestination from OFFICE o, TRIP t where o.ID = t.TO_OFFICE_ID group by mostCommonTripDestination order by count(*) desc limit 1

select tmp.tripid, (select CITY from OFFICE where ID = t.FROM_OFFICE_ID) as shortestTripOrigin, (select CITY from OFFICE where ID = t.TO_OFFICE_ID) as shortestTripDestination from TRIP t, (select (select ID from TRIP order by DATEDIFF(day, LEAVING_DATE, RETURNING_DATE) desc limit 1) as TRIPID from dual) tmp where t.ID = tmp.TRIPID;

select tmp.tripid, (select CITY from OFFICE where ID = t.FROM_OFFICE_ID) as longestTripOrigin, (select CITY from OFFICE where ID = t.TO_OFFICE_ID) as longestTripDestination from TRIP t, (select (select ID from TRIP order by DATEDIFF(day, LEAVING_DATE, RETURNING_DATE) asc limit 1) as TRIPID from dual) tmp where t.ID = tmp.TRIPID;

select et.TRIP_ID, et.FLIGHT_ID, tmp.flightid, tmp2.tripid, (select CITY from OFFICE where ID = t.FROM_OFFICE_ID) as mostExpensiveTripOrigin, (select CITY from OFFICE where ID = t.TO_OFFICE_ID) as mostExpensiveTripDestination from TRIP t, OFFICE o, EMPLOYEE_TRIP et, (select id as flightid from flight order by price desc limit 1) tmp, (select id as tripid from trip) tmp2 where et.TRIP_ID = tmp2.tripid and et.FLIGHT_ID = tmp.flightid and t.ID = TRIP_ID limit 1

select et.TRIP_ID, et.FLIGHT_ID, tmp.flightid, tmp2.tripid, (select CITY from OFFICE where ID = t.FROM_OFFICE_ID) as cheapestTripOrigin, (select CITY from OFFICE where ID = t.TO_OFFICE_ID) as cheapestTripDestination from TRIP t, OFFICE o, EMPLOYEE_TRIP et, (select id as flightid from flight order by price asc limit 1) tmp, (select id as tripid from trip) tmp2 where et.TRIP_ID = tmp2.tripid and et.FLIGHT_ID = tmp.flightid and t.ID = TRIP_ID limit 1
select distinct count(*) as employeeTripQuantity, e.FULL_NAME from EMPLOYEE_TRIP et, EMPLOYEE e where et.EMPLOYEE_ID = e.ID and e.FULL_NAME = #{fullName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select distinct count(*) as periodTripQuantity from TRIP where LEAVING_DATE between Cast(#{leavingDate} as date) and cast(#{returningDate} as date) and RETURNING_DATE between Cast(#{leavingDate} as date) and cast(#{returningDate} as date)
